input.name: __VIEWSTATEGENERATOR

li.data-alt:
UPDATE: NEXT TWO WEEKS: Due to our calendar having a scheduled holiday for Monday, April 13th and Monday April 20th Milford I.S.D. will be distributing meals for students starting Tuesday, April 14th and Tuesday, April 21st, from 11:00 am- 12:00 pm. Meals will be distributed Tuesday only, the meals will include breakfast and lunch for the remainder of the week. Drive-through meal pickup lines are located at the Milford School football concession stand. Parents/Guardians will drive up to the rail by the concession stand and receive one meal per child who attends Milford I.S.D.
On Monday, April 27th we will resume the Monday meal distribution for the entire week.

p.span:
UPDATE: NEXT TWO WEEKS:
Due to our calendar having a scheduled holiday for Monday, April 13th and Monday April 20th Milford I.S.D. will be distributing meals for students starting Tuesday, April 14th and Tuesday, April 21st, from 11:00 am- 12:00 pm. Meals will be distributed Tuesday only, the meals will include breakfast and lunch for the remainder of the week. Drive-through meal pickup lines are located at the Milford School football concession stand. Parents/Guardians will drive up to the rail by the concession stand and receive one meal per child who attends Milford I.S.D.
On Monday, April 27th we will resume the Monday meal distribution for the entire week.

div.div: As Mr. Orndorff continues to monitor the COVID-19 situation we will continue to keep you updated with all information. Below are the following releases we have sent out via our school website, email, and social media. We hope that you continue to stay healthy. If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to email Mr. Orndorff at VOrndorff@Milfordisd.org
To view all letters Milford ISD has published, please visit the COVID-19 section in our quick links. http://milfordisd.org/page/COVID-19

span.style: font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; color: #222222;

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;

div.div: The Milford I.S.D. 2020-2021 Calendar has been developed to provide time for our faculty and staff to plan and prepare engaging lessons for our Bulldog Scholars. We strive to prepare our children for careers that do not even exist today. As you review this calendar, please pay special attention to the student half days on most Fridays of every week. These days are half days for students and full days of planning, collaboration and training for our faculty and staff. The State of Texas mandates we provide 75,600 minutes of instruction time throughout the school year for our students. We have built in 76,616 minutes of instruction time for the 2020-2021 school year.

div.style: color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;
color: #222222; font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; background-color: #ffffff;

div.div: We believe this calendar supports our children's learning and a positive educational experience

p.span: Welcome to Milford Independent School District

div.p:
Milford ISD is a rural school district of 200+ students in grades PK-12. The school and town are located south of Dallas, Texas in the southern most part of Ellis County.
In addition to our excellent academic program, Milford ISD provides services for the following groups:

tr.td:
Dyslexia
ESL (English as Second Language)
Migrant
Gifted and Talented
At-Risk

Title I
Pre-K
Career and Technology
Vocational
Fine Arts

div.div: Our Vision The vision of Milford Independent School District (ISD) is that all students will be challenged, successful, motivated to learn, independent thinkers, and problem solvers. Milford ISD envisions a learning facility where students will achieve academically, explore their interests, grow mentally, morally, and physically through the school's academic, fine arts, athletic and vocational programs.

p.span: Milford ISD | P.O. Box 545 | Milford, TX 76670 | Phone: 972-493-2911 | Fax: 972-493-4600

div.div: MILFORD INDEPEDENT SCHOOL DISTRICT does not and shall not discriminate on the basis of race, color, religion (creed), gender, gender expression, age, national origin (ancestry), disability, marital status, sexual orientation, or military status, in any of its activities or operations. These activities include, but are not limited to, hiring and firing of staff, selection of volunteers and vendors, and provision of services. We are committed to providing an inclusive and welcoming environment for all.
